Description: Faience figure: Egyptian divinity wearing a headdress.
Curator's comments: Description in Salzmann's letter: Egyptian figurine, blue porcelain. Attribution to find-spot is based on Auguste Salzmann's letter to Charles Newton, dated 20 August 1860, in which he describes the contents of a paving hole near the Athena temple on Kamiros acropolis. The letter is kept in the Central Archives of the British Museum.
